document.full_text: cisco, maker of the flip video camera, said it would provide its flipshare service and technical support until dec. 31, 2013, but that videos will expire 30 days after posting.
document.title: an expiration date for flip videos
lines_and_colors: cisco, maker of the flip video camera, said it would provide its flipshare service and technical support until dec. 31, 2013, but that videos will expire 30 days after posting.
